d:entry.d:title: adjust one's position
d:entry.p: 这是比较正规的用法。向……提出警告通常用 give sb. a acution. 或 caution sb.
The referee stops the game to administer the caution.
裁判员为了提出警告而暂停比赛。

d:entry.h3: AFC 亚洲足球联合会的缩写
d:entry.p: 全称 abbreviation for Asian Football Confederation

d:entry.d:title: aggressive play
d:entry.h3: 凶狠积极或主动积极的打法

d:entry.d:title: aggressive player
d:entry.h3: 拼抢凶狠积极的队员，风格凶狠的队员

d:entry.p: 预见到（预料到）对方的行动
The team appealed against the decision.
这个队员对判决（决议）提出上诉。
to make an appeal / to lodge an appeal
An appeal may be lodged with the Board of Appeal within a period of five days.
上诉可在 5 天内向上诉委员会提出。
If the appeal is sustained, the fee shall be refunded to the Association making the appeal.
如果上诉被认可，手续费将归还上诉的协会。

d:entry.d:title: Asian Football Confederation (Abbreviation: AFC)
d:entry.h3: 亚洲足球联合会（缩写为：AFC）

d:entry.p: Although the player didn't find the net himself, he made four assists.
虽然这个球员本身没有破门得分，但他进行了四次有效助攻。
他们开始（发动）快速进攻
They launched direct attacks through the middle.
他们通过中路多次发动直接进攻。
Spain started out with a furious attack and pinned their opponents down for the first few minutes.
西班牙队一开始就展开猛烈攻势，在开场几分钟内将对手压制住。
Their tactics were clear and simple: from a strengthened defensive position they would launch quick attacks to surprise and defeat their opponents.
他们的战术简单明了，先加强防御，然后快速发动进攻，出其不意，击败对手。
Attack after rolled towards the Polish goal, but the East Europeans' defence was well organized and resisted the Spanish pressure.
尽管波兰队的大门遭到对方轮番攻击，但是他们防守严密，顶住了西班牙队的压力。
一有机会就发动进攻（主动积极进攻）
The team attacked their opponents' goal.

d:entry.d:title: attack down the flanks
d:entry.h3: 从两翼进攻；从两侧进攻

d:entry.d:title: attacking football
d:entry.p: All four teams played positive attacking football.
这四个队都打积极主动的攻势足球。
This victory restored one's belief in attacking football.
这次胜利使人们恢复了对攻势足球的信心。
This match was an impressive demonstration of modern attacking football.
这场比赛是一次扣人心弦的现代进攻足球的示范表演。

d:entry.d:title: attacking play
d:entry.p: No blocking tactics were considered from the first minute, attacking play was the dominant factor.
一开场双方均不考虑采用堵截的打法，进攻型的打法在这场比赛中起到了主导作用。
Attacking play is concerned eith advancing the ball upfield and scoring goals.
进攻型打法是将球堆向前场破门得分的一种打法。

d:entry.d:title: attacking third
d:entry.p: They showed a lot of courage to take risk in the attacking third.
他们敢于在前场冒险，反映出他们有很大的勇气。
The Scots were prepared to win the ball back in the attacking third.
苏格兰队准备在前场把球夺回来。

d:entry.h3: 以进攻为主的，进攻型的
d:entry.p: 西拔牙是一支进攻型的球队。

d:entry.d:title: ball watcher
d:entry.h3: 观望队员，在比赛中不积极主动的球员
禁止（某队员参赛），命令（某队员停赛）
d:entry.p: AC Milan defender Mauro Tassotti received a record eight match ban from FIFA's disciplinary committee.
AC 米兰队后卫塔索蒂被国际足联纪律委员会判罚停赛八场，这样的重判是前所未有的。

d:entry.d:title: banana shot
d:entry.p: banana shot with the outside of the foot
用脚外侧踢香蕉球；用外脚背踢香蕉球
The main objective of banana shot is deception -- to lure the goalkepper into the wrong way.
香蕉式射门的主要目的是迷惑守门员，把他的注意力引向错误的方向。
Pele was able to beat three or even four men in a very small area.
贝利能在十分狭窄的地区晃过 3 名甚至 4 名防守队员。
A player in possession of the ball passes over the touch line in order to beat the opponent.
一个控制球的队员为了晃过对方球员越过边线。
意大利队 2:1 打败尼日利亚队。

d:entry.d:title: blanket defence
d:entry.p: The "blanket" defence is designed to assure numerical superiority in the vital area.
密集防守是为了保证在要害地区集中优势兵力而设置的。

d:entry.d:title: blind side
d:entry.p: He must constantly be on the alert for a tackle from the blind side.
他必须时刻警惕来自反方向（球场的另一方）的堵截。
The centre half blocks the ball.
The championship favourite Germans bombarded the Swedish goalmouth.
锦标赛热门队——德国队在瑞典队门前狂轰滥炸。
[译注：book 的原意是（裁判）记下（运动员）的违纪行为。用于足球可译为受到警告处分，此词多用于被动语态。]
Three players were booked during the match.
在这场比赛中 3 名队员受到警告处分。
Player No. 6 was booked for a foul tackle.
6 号队员因抢截犯规受到处分（黄牌警告）。

d:entry.id: bottom right-hand corner of the net
d:entry.d:title: bottom right-hand corner of the net

d:index.d:value: bottom right-hand corner of the net

d:entry.h1: bottom right-hand corner of the net

d:entry.p: The ball bounced off the goal-post.
The ball bounced in front of the goal.

d:entry.d:title: break through
d:entry.p: The forwards broke through the defensive line (the defence).
The Saudis broke through several times on the right flanks.
沙特队几次从右翼突破。
On several occasions they broke through the American defence on the flanks.
他们多次从侧翼突破了美国队的防线。

d:entry.d:title: brilliant performance
d:entry.h3: 出色的表演，精彩的表演

d:entry.p: The Bahrian players were very patient in their build-up.
巴林队员在组织进攻时表现出很大的耐心。

d:entry.d:title: build up an attack
d:entry.p: to build up an attack on the right (left) side of the field
在球场右侧（左侧）组织进攻
The attack may also be built up on the right side of the field through long crossfield passess.
通过长传，转移也可以在球场右侧组织进攻。
They built up their attack quickly.

d:entry.h3: 争抢球（通常指双方队员在门前争抢球），门前混战

d:entry.d:title: capitalize on (upon)
d:entry.p: They capitalized on their opponents' miskake and won the game.
他们利用了对手的错误，赢得了这场比赛的胜利。
这个队员应受到警告处分。
The referee cautioned the player for ungentlemanly conduct.
裁判员对这个队员的不正当行为提出警告。
A player shall be sent off the field of play if he persists in misconduct after having received a caution.
如一个队员警告后仍坚持不正当行为，应将其罚出场。
The wing forward must be able to centre the ball precisely while running at top speed down the sideline.
边锋在高速向底线奔跑时，必须能够准确地将球传中给队友。（注：通俗的说法是下底传中）
The wing forward broke in from the left, where he sent a low centre inside the penalty area.
边锋左路突破，低球传中入禁区。
The wing forward must be able to centre the ball precisely while running at top speed down the sideline.
边锋在高速向底线奔跑时，必须能够准确地将球传中给队友。（注：通俗的说法是下底传中）
The wing forward broke in from the left, where he sent a low centre inside the penalty area.
边锋左路突破，低球传中入禁区。
卫冕冠军队（本届冠军队）
He charges his opponent in a violent or dangerous manner.
他以粗暴的或危险的动作冲撞对方队员。（犯规动作）
charge each other shoulder against shoulder
knock the opponent off-balance by a well-timed shoulder charge
选择好的时机用肩部冲撞使对手失去平衡。

d:entry.d:title: chip kick
d:entry.h3: 蹭球（踢过对方队员头顶的小高球）

d:entry.d:title: chip pass
d:entry.h3: 蹭传（把球提过对方队员头顶传给队友的一种传球方法）
d:entry.p: to make a chip pass with the full instep
The chip pass offers a useful way of feeding the wing forward from the midfield.
蹭传是从中场把球传给边锋的一种有用的传球方法。

d:entry.id: choice of ends and the kick-off
d:entry.d:title: choice of ends and the kick-off

d:index.d:value: choice of ends and the kick-off

d:entry.h1: choice of ends and the kick-off
d:entry.p: At the beginning of the game, choics of ends and the kick-off shall be decided by the toss of a coin. The team winning the toss shall have the option of choice of ends or the kick-off.
比赛开始前，两队可用投币方式来选择场区和开球权。胜者有选择场区或开球的优先权。
（译注：将球踢出守区或译成通俗的说法——解围。）
Sansom of England clears the ball away from Brady and Stampleton of Ireland.
英格兰队的桑森破坏了爱尔兰队布雷迪和斯坦普顿的（传球）进攻，给英格兰队解了围。
将球打出守区，踢向前场
to clear a corner kick with a header
用头球解除了对方队员踢角球造成的危险

d:entry.h3: 将球踢出守区，解除危险（通俗的说法——解围）
d:entry.p: 用钩形脚法踢凌空球将球打出守区
用倒钩球将球踢出守区
to make a powerful clearance kick
解除危险的一脚球（大脚解围）

d:entry.d:title: close contest
d:entry.h3: 势均力敌的比赛，比分接近的比赛

d:entry.d:title: close encounter
d:entry.h3: 势均力敌的比赛，比分接近的比赛

d:entry.d:title: close game
d:entry.h3: 势均力敌的比赛，比分接近的比赛
d:entry.p: 这是一场势均力敌的比赛（比分接近的比赛）。
the head coach of the Chinese football team

d:entry.d:title: colourless football game
d:entry.h3: 不精彩的足球比赛，没有特色的足球比赛或译为平淡无奇的足球比赛

d:entry.id: come from behind to win the game
d:entry.d:title: come from behind to win the game

d:index.d:value: come from behind to win the game

d:entry.h1: come from behind to win the game

d:entry.p: to use a wall pass combination
to beat the lone defender with combinations
使用短传配合打法晃过单个防守队员

d:entry.d:title: combination play
d:entry.h3: 配合打法；短传配合打法

d:entry.d:title: commit an opponent
d:entry.p: （译注：commit 的愿意是使投入战斗，使承担义务。用于足球其含义通常为吸引住（牵制住）对手，迫使其投入战斗，进行堵截等动作。例如进攻队员使用假动作吸引住（牵制住）防守队员使其进行堵截，然后设法把他甩开。）
to provoke the defender into committing himself
使用动作刺激防守队员把他吸引住（牵制住）迫使其进行阻截。
The team lost composure and enthusiasm whenever behind.
每当处于落后的情况时，这个队就很不冷静，缺乏积极性。
Scotland, showing great composure, began to get the upper hand.
苏格兰队表现得沉着冷静，开始占据上风。

d:entry.d:title: concede a goal
d:entry.p: （译注：concede a goal 用于足球主要是指被对方破门丢分，如果失去对球的控制要用 loss possession of the ball。）
In three games they scored 8 goals and conceded none.
在三场比赛中，该队共进了 8 球，未失一球。
Their morale was broken when they conceded the third goal.
该队丢失第三个球时，士气被瓦解了。
Spain socred eleven and did not concede a goal.
西班牙队共攻入 11 球，未失一球。

d:entry.d:title: Confederation Africaine de Football
d:entry.h3: 非洲足球联合会（缩写为 CAF）

d:entry.p: 全称是 Confederation Africaine de Football

d:entry.id: Confederacion Norte-Centroamericana y del Caribe de Futbol
d:entry.d:title: Confederacion Norte-Centroamericana y del Caribe de Futbol

d:index.d:value: Confederacion Norte-Centroamericana y del Caribe de Futbol

d:entry.h1: Confederacion Norte-Centroamericana y del Caribe de Futbol
d:entry.h3: 北美，中美和加勒比地区足球联合会（缩写为 CONCACAF）
北美，中美和加勒比地区足球联合会
d:entry.p: 全称是 Confederacion Norte-Centroamericana y del Caribe de Futbol

d:entry.d:title: Confederacion Sudamericana de Futbol
d:entry.h3: 南美洲足球联合会（缩写为 CONMEBOL）
南美足球联合会的缩写
d:entry.p: 全称是 Confederacion Sudamericana de Futbol

d:entry.h3: 技术稳定，技术水平发挥稳定
d:entry.p: （注：原意是一致的，始终如一的，首尾一贯的，在足球比赛中可转译为技术稳定的，技术水平发挥稳定的。）
技术水平发挥稳定的比赛

d:entry.d:title: Continental football
d:entry.h3: 大陆式足球（欧洲式足球）

d:entry.d:title: convert a penalty kick
d:entry.h3: 罚中，罚球命中，罚点球命中
d:entry.p: Bulgarian striker Stoichkov converted a penalty.
保加利亚队的突前攻击手斯托伊奇科夫罚点球命中。
The Argentines were cool under pressure and showed confidence in their ability.
阿根廷队面临强大攻势，冷静应战，表现出充分的自信。
The team did have problems in their positional play and covering.
这个队在选位和补位方面确实存在问题。

d:entry.d:title: create openings
d:entry.p: It is often very diffcult to create openings, but it can be done.
制造空当通常是很困难的，但可能做到。
No.3 crossed from the left, No.9 dummied, and No.13 crashed the ball into the net.
3号队员从左路传中，9号做个假动作，13号猛射将球送入网底。
The player crosses the ball to his teammate.
这个队员将球传中给他的队友。
The player on the side line crosses the ball to his teammate in the penalty area.
在边线附近的这个队员将球传中给在对方禁区内的同伴。
send in a cross from the left / right
He sent a perfect cross to his teammate.
他提出一个绝妙的传中球将球传给队友。
The ball rebounds from a cross-bar into the field of play.
to curl a kick / a free-kick
踢旋转球 / 踢旋转的任意球

d:entry.d:title: cut in for goal
d:entry.p: The wing forwards must be able to beat the fullbacks to the inside and cut in for goal.
边锋必须能够做到摆脱对方后卫的堵截插入里线抢点射门。
The wing forward cuts in to head the ball at goal.
边锋包抄切入头球抢点射门。
（注：抢点射门通常是起脚劲射，也包括头球抢点射门，英文略有区别。）

d:entry.d:title: dead ball
d:entry.p: Dead ball situations were very poorly exploited during this competition.
在这次比赛中各队对出现的死球（定位球）的情况利用得（处理得）很差。
（译注：原意是防御，根据上下文，有时可译为防线。）

d:entry.d:title: defending champions
d:entry.h3: 卫冕冠军队，上届冠军队

d:entry.d:title: defensive third
d:entry.p: They carried the ball from their defensive third into the midfield.
他们把球从后场带到中场。
（译注：原意是不敷，亏空，赤字，欠缺，用于足球比赛可译为比分落后。）
to deflect the ball over the crossbar
用手掌将球托起，使之越过球门横木
The volley was deflected by the goalkepper.
守门员用手掌将凌空球托起使之越过球门横梁。
（译注：原意是破坏，毁坏，摧毁，拆除。在足球比赛中，可引申其意义，译成大败。）
尼日利亚队 4:0 大败加拿大队。

d:entry.d:title: direct frontal attack
d:entry.p: to launch a direct frontal attack.

d:entry.d:title: dirty play
d:entry.p: （译注：dirty 原意是不干净的，卑鄙的，不正当的，不公正的，用于足球比赛可译为搞很多小动作的。）
No.3 was ruled offside and the goal was disallowed.
3 号队员被判越位，进球无效。
A West German striker and a Dutch defender were dismissed after a scuffle following earlier bookings.
一名西德队的前锋和一名荷兰队的后卫因为受警告处分后又扭打在一起而被判罚出场。

d:entry.d:title: disorganize the defence
d:entry.h3: 破坏对方防守，瓦解对方防守
d:entry.p: （译注：disorganize 意义较灵活，英汉字典译成破坏，打乱或瓦解。可根据上下文内容确定其具体含义。）

d:entry.h3: 鱼跃救球，鱼跃救球动作
d:entry.p: to dive for a high / low ball
to make a dive for the save

d:entry.d:title: diving header
d:entry.p: The centre forward uses a dive header (diving header) to meet a cross and head it into the corner of the goal.
中锋鱼跃顶球将传中的球顶入对方球门的另一角。

d:entry.d:title: diving save
d:entry.h3: 鱼跃救球，鱼跃救球动作
d:entry.p: Yashin demonstrates his skill as he makes a spectacular diving save.
雅辛鱼跃救球，动作精彩漂亮，表现出他高超的技术。
King Pele shows his incredible balance as he dodges a defender.
球王贝利晃过防守队员堵截时，表现出难以置信的平衡能力。

d:entry.d:title: drawn game
d:entry.h3: 平局，比赛不分胜负，握手言和

d:entry.p: Tassotti elbowed Enrique and Enrique's nose was badly hurt.
塔索蒂用肘撞击恩里克。恩里克的鼻子伤势严重。
In the first round most of the amateur teams were eliminated.
在第一轮比赛中大多数业余队被淘汰。
The biggest surprise of fnals of the tournament was the elimination of the U-16 defending champions, the USSR.
本届决赛爆出最大的冷门是16岁以下足球锦标赛上届冠军队——苏联队被淘汰。
（译注：原意是遭遇，遭遇战，冲突，在足球比赛中可译为比赛，交锋。）
这是一场势均力敌的比赛。
（踢任意球时对方队员进入10码（9.15米）区）
Our team shall enter for the football tournament.
我们的队将参加这次足球比赛
They scored the necessary equalizer only shortly before the final whistle.
临近终场他们才扳回必要的一球。

d:entry.d:title: extra time
d:entry.p: The match went to extra time.

d:entry.d:title: fair play
d:entry.h3: 公平的比赛，合法比赛，正当打法

d:entry.d:title: fall back
d:entry.p: One or both fullbacks should fall back to the goal-line.
一个或两个后卫应撤回到球门线（应向球门线后撤）。

d:entry.h3: 夺标呼声很高的球队，夺标热门队
国际足球联合会，国际足联

d:entry.d:title: Federation Internationale de Football Association
d:entry.h3: 国际足球联合会，国际足联

d:entry.p: The inside forward feints to one side to commit the defender. Then he goes to the other side and accelerate past the defender.
内锋使用假动作身体倾向一侧，诱使防守队员也倾向这一侧，然后转向另一侧，加速越过防守队员。

d:entry.d:title: field of play
d:entry.p: at each end of the field of play
The player shall be sent off the field of play.
（译注：final 用于决赛通常使用复数，指决赛的许多场比赛，如指的是随后一场决赛，是用单数）
to qualifield to play in the fnals

d:entry.d:title: final third of the field
d:entry.p: Their attacks have been broken down in the final third of field.
他们多次进攻均在后场被打垮。

d:entry.d:title: final touch
d:entry.p: （译注：原意是最后的修饰，最后的润色，用于足球比赛时，有时将词义作具体化的引申，意指临门一脚。）
The tournament favourites -- the Netherlands threatened Denmark in the extra time but could not find the final touch.
本届锦标赛夺标呼声很高的荷兰队在加时赛中，虽然给丹麦队造成威胁，但临门一脚时机未掌握好，始终未能破门得分。

d:entry.d:title: finesse in football skills
d:entry.p: They showed the kind of football that people expected of them: technical finesse, quick and precise passing.
他们打出了人们期待他们应打出的足球水平：技术细腻，传球快速准确。
射门处理不好（水平不高）是他们最大的弱点。

d:entry.d:title: finishing power
d:entry.p: The forwards must possess the finishing power, the first-touch crash volley, the leaping header or the quick shot out of nowhere.
前锋必须掌握较好的临门技术，直接临空射门，跃起头球射门，从无人注意的地方突然杀出抢点射门等技术。

d:entry.d:title: first-time pass
d:entry.h3: 直接传球，一脚传球，一次传球

d:entry.p: （译注：flair 用于足球比赛，根据上下文可译为高招，绝招，绝活，高超的技术等。）
他们有一手绝招（有一种特殊的天赋。）
use the inside edge of foot to flick the ball
用脚内侧轻拨球；用脚弓轻拨球
a flick pass with the outside edge of the foot

d:entry.h3: 用泛光灯照明；泛光灯；泛光照明

d:entry.d:title: fluid attack
d:entry.h3: 流畅的进攻；灵活多变的进攻
d:entry.p: （译注：fluid 原意是流动的，流体的，易变的，fluid attack 根据上下文可译为流畅的进攻，灵活多变的进攻，无孔不入的进攻。）
There is a need for constant movement without the ball to achieve a mobile and fluid attack.
队员需要经常在无球的情况下运动，以便使进攻灵活多变，流畅，达到无孔不入的效果。
We foiled their attempt to launch an offensive / attack.
我们挫败了他们进攻的企图。
（译注：通常指英式足球 Association Football，简称 football，但在美国也称橄榄球为 football 即美式足球 American Football，soccer 专指英式足球。）

d:entry.d:title: footballing ideas
d:entry.p: The Swedish team was full of footballing ideas (sense).

d:entry.d:title: force majeure
d:entry.h3: 不可抗力；不可抗拒的压力（通常指天灾，战争等）
d:entry.p: The Organizing Committee will take whatever action necessary in case of force majeure.
万一发生不可抗拒情况时，组委会会应采取一切必要措施。

d:entry.d:title: free kick
d:entry.p: a direct free-kick / an indirect free-kick
直接任意球 / 间接任意球
The majority of teams employed a freeman playing behind the defensive line.
多数队安排（使用）一名队员在防守线后面担当“自由人”角色。

d:entry.d:title: front third of the field
d:entry.p: The Scots were prepared to win the ball back in the front third of the field.
苏格兰队准备在前场把球夺回来。

d:entry.h3: 球门的缩写；守门员的缩写

d:entry.d:title: gian possession of the ball
d:entry.p: Player No.8 gained possession of the ball.

d:entry.d:title: goal difference
d:entry.p: （译注：净胜球是进球数减去负球数，用于获胜场数相等的球队之间决定名次。）

d:entry.d:title: goal scorer
d:entry.p: He is the main goal scorer of our team.
他是我们队的主要进球手。

d:entry.d:title: guest team
d:entry.p: The home team beat the guest team 2:1.

d:entry.d:title: half-volley kick
d:entry.p: （译注：指在球刚落地反弹的一瞬间将球踢出。）

d:entry.d:title: handle the ball with hand
d:entry.h3: 用手或臂触球，带球或击球
d:entry.p: He handles (carries, strikes) the ball with his hand or arm.
他用手或手臂触摸球（带球，击球）。

d:entry.d:title: hat trick
d:entry.h3: 帽子戏法；一人连进 3 球

d:entry.p: He demonstrates excellent technique as he unleashes a powerful header.
他的头球强劲有力，显示出高超技术。

d:entry.d:title: heel kick
d:entry.h3: 脚后跟；用脚后跟向后传球

d:entry.p: The second half passed without any highlight worthy of mention.
下半场比赛没有什么值得一提的精彩场面。
他拉扯对方球员。（犯规动作）

d:entry.h3: 用手或臂拉扯对方（犯规动作）

d:entry.d:title: individual play
d:entry.h3: 个人技术；个人动作；个人踢法

d:entry.d:title: individual skill
d:entry.p: They have very good individual skills.
他们有很好的个人技术。
Their indivisual skill level was as good as any other team.
（译注：如将个人技术作为整体概念来考虑，通常作不可数名词，使用单数。）
这个队的个人技术可与任何一个队相媲美（一样好）。
The individual skills of the palyers were the side's main assets.
（译注：如指多种个人技术，则用复数。）
个人技术高超是指这个队的主要实力所在。

d:entry.d:title: in peak form
d:entry.h3: 经济状态极好；状态极好

d:entry.d:title: inside foot passing
d:entry.h3: 用脚内侧传球；内脚背传球

d:entry.d:title: inter-league matches
d:entry.h3: 竞赛联合会之间的比赛

d:entry.d:title: international football match A / B
d:entry.h3: A 类国际比赛 / B 类国际比赛

d:entry.d:title: in the air
d:entry.p: The defender was good in the air.
这个防守队员擅长争顶头球。
juggling the ball with the forehead / the thigh / the foot
用前额 / 大腿 / 脚 耍球

d:entry.d:title: jump at the opponent
d:entry.h3: 跳起冲撞对手（犯规动作）

d:entry.d:title: key figure
d:entry.p: His technical skills, vision and role in set plays made him a key figure in the team.
他技术高超，有预见性以及在定位进攻中的良好作用使他成为该队的核心人物。

d:entry.d:title: key player
d:entry.p: A major handicap was the absence of serveral key players.
主要的不利因素是该队有几名主力队员不能上场。

d:entry.d:title: kick off
d:entry.p: After half-time, the kick-off shall be taken by a player of the opposite team.
下半场比赛，由对方球队开球。
The match is due to kick off at 7:00 pm.
足球比赛预期在晚7时开始。

d:entry.id: kick the ball backward with the heel
d:entry.d:title: kick the ball backward with the heel

d:index.d:value: kick the ball backward with the heel

d:entry.h1: kick the ball backward with the heel
